env.reset()
alt=3

for i in range(10):
    alt+=1
    for j in range(alt):
        obs = env.step(1)
        if os=="nt":
            env.render()
        print(f'{obs[0][0]:0.2f} {obs[0][1]:0.2f} {obs[0][2]:0.2f} {obs[0][3]:0.2f} {obs[0][4]:0.2f} {obs[0][5]:0.2f}')
    for k in range(alt):
        obs = env.step(-1)
        if os=="nt":
            env.render()
        print(f'{obs[0][0]:0.2f} {obs[0][1]:0.2f} {obs[0][2]:0.2f} {obs[0][3]:0.2f} {obs[0][4]:0.2f} {obs[0][5]:0.2f}')
